abilities.name: Hulking Strength
abilities.details: Dun-Can does not scale on attack speed, but his basic attack deals additional [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]) to all enemies in a straight line.[n]Additional attack speed will be converted to bonus [ad]physical power[/].

abilities.name: Shield Bash
abilities.details: Dun-Can bashes the enemies in a cone-shaped direction with his shield, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) to all enemies in the area.[n]Shield Bash also slightly [db]knocks[/] the enemies back and briefly [db]slows[/] them.

abilities.name: Steadfast Presence
abilities.details: Dun-Can tumbles to a target direction, gaining increased [ar]physical resistance[/] and [mr]magical resistance[/] for a duration.

abilities.name: Valiant Charge
abilities.details: Dun-Can charges at a target enemy, pushing the target back along the way and dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]).[n]If the target is knocked onto a wall, Valiant Charge will stun the target for a short duration, dealing additional [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/] and [hp]maximum health[/]).

abilities.name: Defensive Front
abilities.details: Dun-Can holds up his shield and creates a giant wall that [bf]blocks all projectiles[/] including ultimate, except turret blasts.[n]Dun-Can also gains increased [ms]movement speed[/] and the ability to [bf]move through units[/].[n]However, he can only use Shield Bash and Valiant Charge during Defensive Front.[n]Shield Bash has a rectangle hit box instead of a cone, and Valiant Charge will push multiple enemies at once. Both abilities range are based on the wall's length.
